recipes.title: MINI MEAT PIE
recipes.instructions: On a well-floured surface, roll out your puff pastry dough to just over 21 x 18 inches.Cut your dough into 3-inch squares.Working with about 6 squares at a time, put 1 tablespoon of meat filling in the center of each square and brush some beaten egg on the edges with a pastry brush.Fold the square diagonally, making sure to not get any meat on the edges. If you put too much filling in the center.Crimp the edges with your fingers to seal, and then press the edges with a fork to double-check the seal and to make a pretty pattern.Brush some more beaten egg on one side and place them on a cookie sheet so that they don’t touch each other.Cook in a 375F oven for about 15 minutes, or until brown on the top.Remove from the oven

steps.step: On a well-floured surface, roll out your puff pastry dough to just over 21 x 18 inches.

Cut your dough into 3-inch squares.Working with about 6 squares at a time, put 1 tablespoon of meat filling in the center of each square and brush some beaten egg on the edges with a pastry brush.Fold the square diagonally, making sure to not get any meat on the edges. If you put too much filling in the center.Crimp the edges with your fingers to seal, and then press the edges with a fork to double-check the seal and to make a pretty pattern.
Brush some more beaten egg on one side and place them on a cookie sheet so that they don’t touch each other.Cook in a 375F oven for about 15 minutes, or until brown on the top.
